com.smarterapp.mobilebrowser
Class DeviceStatus

java.lang.Object
  com.smarterapp.mobilebrowser.DeviceStatus
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetworkReceiver.NetworkStatusHandler
public class DeviceStatus
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetworkReceiver.NetworkStatusHandler

Data wrapper that holds information about the current device. This class will also optionally listen for changes in some status features such as network connectivity state.

updateTTSStatus

public boolean updateTTSStatus()
Check if the processes 'com.google.android.tts' is currently running.

Returns:
true if the tts process is running, false otherwise.

haveInternetConnection

public boolean haveInternetConnection()
Check the current status of internet connectivity. This method iterates over the available network interfaces and checks for an active connection.

Returns:
true if a connection was detected, false otherwise.
